author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
FNAF pt2; I first found out about FNAF when Mark played the first game, I checked every day to see the next video. With Mark revisiting the games & having gotten two SB endings, I’m pretty sure it’s not going away any time soon.
(14/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Pt2*
Mark pt2; he seems to be genuinely happy doing what he’s doing, and I’ve been watching his videos since I was nine.
FNAF; yeah… this was a hyperfixation a while ago, but the the emergence of Security Breach, it has resurfaced. Was kinda sad Bonnie wasn’t there tho. (13/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Ranboo pt; he’s an overall goofy and fun guy, the hate he gets for the actions of others in the DSMP is quite saddening.
Markiplier; Yes, another YouTuber. Mark has always brought me joy when he plays games for himself & fans and not JUST for his fans. (12/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
On to Hyperfixations:
Ranboo; as I stated above, he has become a hyperfixation of mine. I feel people have done him pretty dirty just because he exists in the DSMP, he seems to be a genuinely good guy who just wants to make people happy. (11/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Sexualities/Genders pt2; There are many labels and micro-labels, each having their own significance to the ones who use them. I love to see them flower and bloom, it’s like watching a puppy learn to walk in real-time.
Junebugs; Idk, I just like putting them in my hands. (10/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Mental health pt2; I’ve learned a lot about DID and OSDD from those I’ve met with it, and I greatly appreciate the kindness and patience those with the disorders had with MY curious ass. /pos
Sexualities/Genders; I like to learn as much as I can about my community. (9/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Costume making pt2; I plan to try and get myself good enough to sell fursuits/cosplay/plushies. With my “squirrel” moments, I don’t think it’ll happen.
Mental health; I’m always interested in learning about mental health issues, even if they aren’t my own. (8/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Math(?); I’m apparently really good at math, it’s not an interest, but it’s there I guess. I make stupid mistakes a lot, but it’s because I rush too much.
Costume making; I do this a lot, actually! I make fursuits, cosplay, and sometimes even plushies! (7/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text: Art pt2; it was a good awakening, I guess, I started working harder on my skill. Although, I think that’s what sectioned me off from others, especially because I would force myself to learn faster so I could get back to drawing. I don’t have to take math senior year. (6/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Could* not found.
Theater pt2; the emotion, the costumes, the lighting, music— all of it is what draws me to it.
Art; I’ve always been told that I was good at drawing, I don’t think I ever believed them until I posted my art online & was complimented by a complete stranger. (5/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Minecraft pt3; I have always dreamed of getting through my procrastination and “squirrel” moments so I found actually start my own SMP. I made Voidbahh for that (& to piss off Meowbahh, whom I don’t like).
Theater; I’ve always been infatuated with acting… (4/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text: Minecraft (pt2); Although I do watch Minecraft, I don’t watch DSMP. I used to, before crap hit the fan & people found out about things that ppl associated with Dream did, but I still keep up with info on Ranboo as much as possible, as he is a hyperfixation of mine. (3/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Seeing the world through someone else’s eyes; I have many alt accounts, most of them being that of a person I cannot be.
Minecraft; playing Minecraft has always been fun, I used to watch SSundee, Mr. Crainer, Stampy, as well as Markiplier’s Drunk Minecraft. (2/?)

author: Polynomius 🔜 AnthroCon
text:
Interests:
Doing thorough research on Paraphilias; what causes them, how they can affect the person, how they can be dealt with, and how their subject is affected (if it’s a living creature/thing).
Private investigations; what it takes, things to look out for. (1/?)
